Upgrade to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan

Your plan will be upgraded from {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan. The plan will be upgraded with immediate effect. Post upgrade, all the requests will be charged ${{ changePlanConfirm.costPerRequest}} per request.
{{ 'planUpgraded'}}

Switch to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan

Your plan will be downgraded from {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan. The plan will be updated with immediate effect. Post plan migration, all the requests will be charged ${{changePlanConfirm.costPerRequest}} per request.
{{ 'requestedDowngrade'}}
{{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}}.
{{ 'newPlanEffectiveBilling'}}
{{ 'starting'}} {{changePlanConfirm.newCycle}}.
{{ 'requestPlanDowngrade'}}

Upgrade to Enterprise Plan

Your plan will be upgraded from {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan. Post upgrade, all the sessions will be charged ${{changePlanConfirm.newPrice}} per session.

Enterprise Plan requires a minimum reload of $ 1,000. You will be redirected to the payment page to make the reload.

You are now part of {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan

Your Virtual Assistant is successfully {{(planupdateType === 'upgrade' || cb.license.planId === 'free') ?'upgraded': 'downgraded'}} to the {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan. All new requests will be charged ${{changePlanConfirm.costPerRequest}} per request.

{{ 'confirmNewPlan'}}

Auto Reload

Auto Reload for
$
When Balance Drops Below
$
You can specify mimimum credits to be maintained in your account. Once the credit falls below the mimimum, the amount will be debited automatically from your card on the file and your account will be credited.

{{'Cancel Subscription?'}}

You can place the request to cancel your current {{supportplan.planName}} Support Plan. However, the subscription will be canceled only at the end of the current billing cycle.
Your plan will be cancelled on {{supportplan.endDate | date: 'd MMMM, y'}}.

{{'plan_upgrade_successful_support_desc' | i18nString:({newPlan:changePlanConfirm.newPlan, currentPlan: changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}) }}

Upgrade to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan

You can upgrade from {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan immediately. You will get a pro-rated discount for the {{changePlanConfirm.endDate | date: 'd'}} days left in the current billing cycle of the {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan. This discount will be applied in the first billing cycle of your new plan subscription.

Switch to {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Plan?

You can place the request to switch to the {{changePlanConfirm.currentPlan}} Plan from your current {{changePlanConfirm.newPlan}} Support Plan. However, the plan migration would be initiated only at the end of the current billing cycle.
Your plan will be switched on {{changePlanConfirm.endDate | date: 'd MMMM, y'}}
